songs.title: I’ll Be There
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
If you need me, I'll be there
When you don't want to love you
When you broken and hurt too
If you need me, I'll be there
When you craving attention
And unquestionable questions
I'll be there, I'll be there

[Pre-Chorus]
And the drugs don't work
And it feels like it only get worst
I'll be there for, I'll be there for
